newsitem.title: HONG KONG: APT Satellite to kick off road show soon - sources.
newsitem.headline: APT Satellite to kick off road show soon - sources.

text.p: Satellite service provider APT Satellite Holdings Ltd, which plans to seek a dual listing in Hong Kong and New York, is expected to kick off its road show late next week, market sources said on Thursday.

Market sources said an initial public offering of the company's shares in Hong Kong is expected to run from December 10-13. The issue is expected to price on December 13, with dealing expected to begin on December 18.
Sources said Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette is expected to be the sponsor of the issue. No further listing details were immediately available.
APT Satellite said earlier this month that it intended to make an initial public offering of its shares in Hong Kong and through American Depositary Shares in New York.
It said proceeds of about US$250 million would be used to repay bank debts with the remainder to finance the construction and launch of future satellites.
